author: Sam Morshead For Mailonline
title: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte 'eats and sleeps football' | Daily Mail Online
text: More scores 'You learn a lot with him, a lot. The Italian style is very good for defenders.' Chelsea, who beat Arsenal 3-1 in the Premier League on Saturday, face Burnley this weekend as they aim to open up even more breathing space at the summit. A title triumph would go a long way to erasing the memories of the desperately disappointing 2015-16 campaign, during which Jose Mourinho lost his job and the Blues finished 10th. Zouma is eager to scrub all that from the record books. 'It was a bad season, now we are doing well again,' he said. 'Conte loves what he does. He wants to give that special feeling to us. 'We need to love football like he does, to breathe football. That's what he wants.' RELATED ARTICLES
